dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Wednesday, April 25, 2007 4:28 PM To: Copyright Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3886778O] [URGENT] Apple Trade Secret and Copyrighted Material Disseminated by Insanely Mac -- Immediate Action Demanded ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. [URGENT] Apple Trade Secret and Copyrighted Material Disseminated by Insanely Mac -- Immediate Action Demanded Added by system at Wednesday, Apr 25 2007 09:27 pm X-MailFrom: IRamage@OMM.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Wed, 25 Apr 2007 22:27:02 -0400 X-Server-Uuid: 8B598DAA-16FA-41E4-8811-118B60466F6C Received: from LACL3MSG1.firm.omm.com ([10.51.0.192]) by lasmtp1.firm.omm.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Wed, 25 Apr 2007 19:27:01 -0700 X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft Exchange V6.5 Content-class: urn:content-classes:message MIME-Version: 1.0 Subject: [URGENT] Apple Trade Secret and Copyrighted Material Disseminated by Insanely Mac -- Immediate Action Demanded Date: Wed, 25 Apr 2007 19:27:00 -0700 Message-ID: <3E6635848F28C54490A010FFD27770B609531A2B@LACL3MSG1.firm.omm.com> X-MS-Has-Attach: X-MS-TNEF-Correlator: Thread-Topic: [URGENT] Apple Trade Secret and Copyrighted Material Disseminated by Insanely Mac -- Immediate Action Demanded Thread-Index: AceHql7V0M6uzdzeQr2Rlnq9tHCJjA== X-Priority: 1 Priority: Urgent Importance: high From: "Ramage, Ian" To: domains@fubra.com cc: abuse@theplanet.com, admins@theplanet.com X-OriginalArrivalTime: 26 Apr 2007 02:27:01.0714 (UTC) FILETIME=[5F57FB20:01C787AA] X-TMWD-Spam-Summary: TS=20070426022706; SEV=2.2.2; DFV=B2007042511; IFV=2.0.4,4.0-9; AIF=B2007042511; RPD=5.02.0125; ENG=IBF; RPDID=7374723D303030312E30413031303230312E34363330304446412E303031372C73 733D312C6667733D30; CAT=NONE; CON=NONE X-MMS-Spam-Filter-ID: B2007042511_5.02.0125_4.0-9 X-WSS-ID: 6A2ED27C24C6623514-01-01 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----_=_NextPart_001_01C787AA.5F11540F" Received-SPF: pass (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: domain of OMM.com designates 151.194.4.202 as permitted sender) client-ip=151.194.4.202; envelope-from=IRamage@OMM.com; helo=mail3.omm.com; (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) Brendan McLoughlin Administrative Contact for InsanelyMac.com Fubra Limited Manor Coach House Church Hill Aldershot, Hampshire GU12 4RQ United Kingdom Mr. McLoughlin: We represent Apple Inc. ("Apple"). It has come to our attention that a user of a website registered to you, InsanelyMac.com, is posting screenshots and confidential details of a pre-release developer's build (9A410) of Apple's new operating system, Mac OS X 10.5 (aka "Leopard"). The forum in question is http://forum.insanelymac.com/index.php?showtopic=48246. This software has been distributed to developers under strict terms of confidentiality that prohibit any dissemination of the code or screenshots of the software. The software is also copyrighted by Apple, and copyright law specifically prohibits unauthorized distribution and displays of copyrighted works. Apple therefore demands that you immediately disable this forum, destroy all screenshots on your servers, and refrain from the unauthorized dissemination of Apple trade secret and copyrighted material in the future. Please notify me by reply e-mail once you have complied with the first two demands. If you are represented by counsel, please provide me with their identity. Thank you in advance for your cooperation, /s/ Ian Ramage Ian Ramage > O'Melveny & Myers LLP > Embarcadero Center West 275 Battery Street, Suite 2600 San Francisco, CA 94111 Phone: 415.984.8783 Fax: 415.984.8701 iramage@omm.com DMCA Certification: I hereby state, under penalty of perjury, that I have a good faith belief that the activities described above are not authorized by Apple, that the information in this notification is accurate, and that I am authorized to act on behalf of Apple in this regard. > This message and any attached documents contain information from the > law firm of O'Melveny & Myers LLP that may be confidential and/or > privileged. If you are not the intended recipient, you may not read, > copy, distribute, or use this information. If you have received this > transmission in error, please notify the sender immediately by reply > e-mail and then delete this message. > > MIME element (text/html) [URGENT] Apple Trade Secret and Copyrighted Material Disseminated by Insanely Mac -- Immediate Action Demanded

Brendan McLoughlin
Administrative Contact for InsanelyMac.com
Fubra Limited
Manor Coach House
Church Hill
Aldershot, Hampshire GU12 4RQ
United Kingdom
Mr. McLoughlin:

We represent Apple Inc. ("Apple").  It has come to our attention that a user of a website registered to you, InsanelyMac.com, is posting screenshots and confidential details of a pre-release developer's build (9A410) of Apple's new operating system, Mac OS X 10.5 (aka "Leopard"). The forum in question is http://forum.insanelymac.com/index.php?showtopic=48246.

This software has been distributed to developers under strict terms of confidentiality that prohibit any dissemination of the code or screenshots of the software. The software is also copyrighted by Apple, and copyright law specifically prohibits unauthorized distribution and displays of copyrighted works.

Apple therefore demands that you immediately disable this forum, destroy all screenshots on your servers, and refrain from the unauthorized dissemination of Apple trade secret and copyrighted material in the future.  Please notify me by reply e-mail once you have complied with the first two demands.  If you are represented by counsel, please provide me with their identity. 

Thank you in advance for your cooperation,

/s/ Ian Ramage
Ian Ramage
O’Melveny & Myers LLP
Embarcadero Center West
275 Battery Street, Suite 2600
San Francisco, CA 94111
Phone: 415.984.8783
Fax: 415.984.8701
iramage@omm.com
DMCA Certification: I hereby state, under penalty of perjury, that I have a good faith belief that the activities described above are not authorized by Apple, that the information in this notification is accurate, and that I am authorized to act on behalf of Apple in this regard.

This message and any attached documents contain information from the law firm of O’Melveny & Myers LLP that may be confidential and/or privileged. If you are not the intended recipient, you may not read, copy, distribute, or use this information. If you have received this transmission in error, please notify the sender immediately by reply e-mail and then delete this message.


MIME element (text/plain)
